summary: This is a brief email transmitting the Office of Professional Responsibility's (OPR) final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter to the Southern District of New York (SDNY). It includes two attachments: the transmittal letter and the full report with exhibits.

events.title: OPR Final Report Transmittal
events.description: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) transmits its final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter to the Southern District of New York (SDNY).

keyFacts: The Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) completed its final report on the Jeffrey Epstein matter.
The report was transmitted to the Southern District of New York (SDNY) on November 12, 2020.
The transmission included two attachments: a transmittal letter and the full report with exhibits.
